article.title: Raytheon to Provide Miniature Air-Launched Jammers
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Company, Missile Systems, Tucson, Arizona, is being awarded $81,839,791 firm-fixed price contract for miniature air-launched decoy jammers.Â The contracting activity is the Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Eglin Air Force Base, Florida.
